detectors.description:
CropsToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#771-789) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#781)
detectors.markdown:
[CropsToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#L771-L789) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#L781)

detectors.description:
ERC20.constructor(string,string).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#311) shadows:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#320-322) (function)

	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#328-330) (function)

CropsToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#637-678) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,CROPS::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#676)
detectors.markdown:
[CropsToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#L637-L678) uses timestamp for comparisons

detectors.description:
CropsToken.getChainId() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#796-800) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#798)
Pragma version0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CropsToken.sol#7) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
